thread.title: BRIEF-Esker Q3 revenue up at 14.2 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Esker Q3 revenue up at 14.2 million euros

title: BRIEF-Esker Q3 revenue up at 14.2 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Esker Q3 revenue up at 14.2 million euros 
Oct 20 Esker SA : 
* Q3 revenue 14.2 million euros ($16.12 million) versus 11.2 million euros year ago 
* Expects a strong improvement of its operating income in 2015 
* Expects FY 2015 revenue up at least 25 pct (12 pct ro 14 pct in organic growth) 
* Cash position at 30 September 2015 stood at 14 million euros, at the same level as last year Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8809 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
